001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.AddressParser;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
007import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
008
009/**
010 * Raw, immutable data for a pay-to-address transaction output
011 */
012public class TransactionOutputAddress implements TransactionOutputData {
013    private final long amount;
014    private final Address address;
015
016    public TransactionOutputAddress(Coin amount, Address address) {
017        this.amount = amount.toSat();
018        this.address = address;
019    }
020
021    public TransactionOutputAddress(long amount, Address address) {
022        this.amount = amount;
023        this.address = address;
024    }
025
026    public TransactionOutputAddress(long amount, String address) {
027        this.amount = amount;
028        this.address = AddressParser.getDefault().parseAddress(address);
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public Coin amount() {
033        return Coin.ofSat(amount);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public Script scriptPubKey() {
038        return ScriptBuilder.createOutputScript(address);
039    }
040
041    public Address address() {
042        return address;
043    }
044
045}
